name: tm44
effect: Teaches Rest to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Rest to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user goes to sleep for two turns. This fully restores the user’s HP and heals any status conditions.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The user goes to sleep for two turns. This fully restores the user’s HP and heals any status conditions.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The user plays rough with the target and attacks it. This may also lower the target’s Attack stat.
